description.raw:
Most of the code is ported from the sensors system. The idea is that the same component will be shared by both sensors and gui systems.

A Scene3D system that makes use of this rendering component will come in a separate PR.

Also updated the SceneManager to parse PBR material parameters. You can test with `examples/worlds/fuel_textured_mesh.sdf`. Requires [ign-fuel-tools pull request #95](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/pull-requests/95/fix-pbr-material-uri/diff). See screenshot below. The human model in the gui render window does not have textures yet and will be addressed in the Scene3D system.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2443792578-Screenshot_from_2019-05-01_17-33-06.png)
